nodes.bodyText: I think there is a pageScrollService integrated in the code base. Can you try to integrate that?

There is no need to have this @Input.
Instead we can add @Input to isEditDetailsCollapsed.
We can directly pass the attribute: <tm-instructor-help-students-section isEditDetailsCollapsed='collapseStudentEditDetailsInChild'></tm-instructor-help-students-section>
